regular-grammar.sample-log: #Software: Microsoft Internet Information Services 7.5 #Version: 1.0 #Date: 2012-09-14 03:15:29 #Fields: date time s-ip cs-method cs-uri-stem cs-uri-query s-port cs-username c-ip cs(User-Agent) sc-status sc-substatus sc-win32-status time-taken 2012-09-14 03:15:29 127.0.0.1 GET /SignallingHub/state.js name=as&nodeId=123 80 - 127.0.0.1 Mozilla/5.0+(Windows+NT+6.1;+WOW64)+AppleWebKit/537.1+(KHTML,+like+Gecko)+Chrome/21.0.1180.89+Safari/537.1 404 0 2 859 2012-09-14 03:15:29 127.0.0.1 GET /favicon.ico - 80 - 127.0.0.1 Mozilla/5.0+(Windows+NT+6.1;+WOW64)+AppleWebKit/537.1+(KHTML,+like+Gecko)+Chrome/21.0.1180.89+Safari/537.1 404 0 2 1 2012-09-14 03:16:24 127.0.0.1 GET /SignallingHub/state.js name=as&nodeId=123 80 - 127.0.0.1 Mozilla/5.0+(Windows+NT+6.1;+WOW64)+AppleWebKit/537.1+(KHTML,+like+Gecko)+Chrome/21.0.1180.89+Safari/537.1 404 0 2 3 2012-09-14 03:16:24 127.0.0.1 GET /favicon.ico - 80 - 127.0.0.1 Mozilla/5.0+(Windows+NT+6.1;+WOW64)+AppleWebKit/537.1+(KHTML,+like+Gecko)+Chrome/21.0.1180.89+Safari/537.1 404 0 2 2

format.description: Extended Log Format with mandatory "date" and "time" fields
